item.title: Plox help :S
item.dc:creator: @arve arve
item.description:
@arve wrote:

okay when i try to add some specials i get errors…

for example i add this code

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 746 && specialAmount > 74){ stillgfx(371, EnemyY, EnemyX); stillgfx(644, absY, absX); specialAtk(false, 75, 600, 2927); hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(40); getHit(0); AttackingOn2.EntangleDelay = 5; }

thats the zamorak special if im not wrong.

well when i add that and compile and stuff.
i get an error saying attackingon2 variable or sumthing.

and i was wondering how i can add a variable like that ? :S

can i just add public int attackingon2 = 0;

or huh ? :S pl0x help me

Read full topic
